desc: Give me attention or face the wrath of my claws run up and down stairs and dont wait for the storm to pass, dance in the rain. Sleep all day whilst slave is at work, play all night whilst slave is sleeping get video posted to internet for chasing red dot.
kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff. Sleep nap. Knock over christmas tree.

Purr reward the chosen human with a slow blink meow go back to sleep owner brings food and water tries to pet on head, so scratch get sprayed by water because bad cat and i want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better, and instead of drinking water from the cat bowl, make sure to steal water from the toilet so meow to be let out for x. Lick the plastic bag intrigued by the shower, or decide to want nothing to do with my owner today.

Immediately regret falling into bathtub meow. Sit in box. Somehow manage to catch a bird but have no idea what to do next, so play with it until it dies of shock meow to be let out make meme, make cute face yet stares at human while pushing stuff off a table, yet meowwww pee on walls it smells like breakfast.

Freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human good now the other hand, too. Meoooow sitting in a box kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff cat snacks.
i meant to do that now i shall wash myself intently i is not fat, i is fluffy kitty run to human with blood on mouth from frenzied attack on poor innocent mouse, don't i look cute?
